actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to restrict persons who are not citizens of the United States from acquiring more than 35 percent of the nonvoting securities or more than 5 percent of the voting securities of any issuer whose securities are registered under such act.

summary.text: Foreign Investors Limitation Act - Restricts persons, under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, who are not citizens of the United States from acquiring more than 35 percent of the nonvoting securities or more than 5 percent of the voting securities of any issuer whose securities are registered under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to restrict persons who are not citizens of the United States from acquiring more than 35 percent of the nonvoting securities or more than 5 percent of the voting securities of any issuer whose securities are registered under such act.
